block_comment: This block enables an 8-deep FIFO buffer under specific conditions. The buffer is enabled if the write pointer indicates a position of 8 and there's at least one input ("input_ge1"), or if there are at least two free spaces (ge2_free) and the incremented write pointer is at position 8 ("fifo_wrptr_plus1== 4'd8") along with at least two inputs ("input_ge2"), or finally, if there are three free spaces (ge3_free) with the doubly incremented write pointer at position 8 with at least three inputs ("input_ge3").
